Fullname_jp: 青雲の志 エンバー

transcend.4_1:
ATK DEF HP +16%
Self Max HP +35%
Allies' Evasion +4%
When enemy uses Counterattack, Revenge, or Agile Response, increase self Priority +30%
transcend.4_1_jp:
ATK DEF HP +16%
自身最大HP+35%
味方の回避+4%
敵の反撃、復讐、迅速対応使用時、自身の行動ゲージ+30%
transcend.4_1_kr:
ATK DEF HP +16%
자신 최대 체력 +35%
아군 회피 +4%
적 반격,복수,신속 대응 사용 시 자신 행동 게이지 증가 +30%
transcend.4_1_zh:
ATK DEF HP +16%
自身最大生命值+35%
我方全体闪避+4%
当敌人使用<color=#28d9ed>反击</color>、<color=#28d9ed>复仇</color>或<color=#28d9ed>迅速应对</color>时,自身<color=#28d9ed>行动值</color>提升30%。
transcend.5_1:
ATK DEF HP +22%
Burst Level 3 Unlocked
On entry, AP +50
When enemy acts, gain Azure Will +2 (once per turn)
transcend.5_1_jp:
ATK DEF HP +22%
バーストLv.3解放
入場時AP+50
敵が行動時、「青き情熱」+2(1ターンに1回)
transcend.5_1_kr:
ATK DEF HP +22%
버스트 3단계 해금
입장 시 AP +50
적 행동 시 푸른 열정 +2 (1턴에 1회)
transcend.5_1_zh:
ATK DEF HP +22%
解锁爆发Lv.3
入场时AP+50
敌方行动时,「蓝色热情」+2(每回合1次)
transcend.6:
ATK DEF HP +30%
When hit, reduce own skill cooldown by 2 turns (once per turn)
At battle start, gain Azure Will +2
When enemy uses Counterattack, Revenge, or Agile Response, increase self Priority +40%
transcend.6_jp:
ATK DEF HP +30%
被弾時、自身のスキルターン-2(1ターンに1回)
戦闘開始時、「青き情熱」+2
敵の反撃敵の反撃、復讐、迅速対応使用時、自身の行動ゲージ+40%
transcend.6_kr:
ATK DEF HP +30%
피격 시 자신 스킬 쿨타임 -2턴 (1턴에 1회)
전투 시작 시 푸른 열정 +2
적 반격,복수,신속 대응 사용 시 자신 행동 게이지 증가 +40%
transcend.6_zh:
ATK DEF HP +30%
被击时,自身<color=#28d9ed>技能冷却时间</color>-2(每回合限1次)
战斗开始时,<color=#28d9ed>蓝色热情</color>+2
当敌人使用<color=#28d9ed>反击</color>、<color=#28d9ed>复仇</color>或<color=#28d9ed>迅速应对</color>时,自身<color=#28d9ed>行动值</color>提升40%。

SKT_FIRST.name: Dolphin Charge!
SKT_FIRST.true_desc: Inflicts fixed damage equal to <color=#28d9ed>10%</color> of the caster's Max Health on the enemy, then attacks. Has a <color=#28d9ed>30%</color> chance to dispel <color=#28d9ed>1</color> <color=#28d9ed>Buff(s)</color> from the target, and gains <color=#28d9ed>1</color> <color=#28d9ed>Unique Resource: Azure Will</color>.\nDamage dealt increases proportional to Max Heath instead of Attack.
SKT_FIRST.true_desc_jp: 敵に自身の最大HPの<color=#28d9ed>10%</color>分の固定ダメージを与えた後、攻撃する。\n<color=#28d9ed>30%</color>の確率で対象の<color=#28d9ed>強化効果</color>を<color=#28d9ed>1</color>個解除し、<color=#28d9ed>「青き情熱」</color>を<color=#28d9ed>1</color>獲得する。\nここのスキルは攻撃力の代わりに最大HPが高いほどダメージがUPする。
SKT_FIRST.true_desc_kr: 적에게 자신의 최대 체력의 <color=#28d9ed>10%</color> 만큼 고정 피해를 입힌 후 공격합니다. <color=#28d9ed>30%</color> 확률로 대상의 <color=#28d9ed>강화 효과</color>를 <color=#28d9ed>1개</color> 해제하고, <color=#28d9ed>고유 자원 : 푸른 열정</color>을 <color=#28d9ed>1개</color> 획득합니다.\n이 스킬은 공격력 대신 최대 체력에 비례하여 피해가 증가합니다.
SKT_FIRST.true_desc_zh: 对敌人造成相当于自身最大生命值<color=#28d9ed>10%</color>的固定伤害后进行攻击。有<color=#28d9ed>30%</color>概率解除目标的<color=#28d9ed>1</color>个<color=#28d9ed>强化效果</color>,并获得<color=#28d9ed>1</color><color=#28d9ed>「蓝色热情」</color>。\n该技能的伤害随施术者的最大生命值提高。

SKT_BURST_1.effect_jp: 強化解除強化の\n発動確率+50%\n(効果抵抗無視)
SKT_BURST_1.effect_kr: 강화 해제 강화\n(효과 저항 무시)\n(발동 확률 +50%)
SKT_BURST_1.effect_zh: 强化解除强化\n发动概率+50%\n(无视效果抵抗)

SKT_BURST_3.effect: Replaces with Empowered Skill\nAttack range expanded\nAzure Will +1
SKT_BURST_3.effect_jp: 強化スキルに置換\n攻撃範囲拡大\n「青き情熱」+1
SKT_BURST_3.effect_kr: 강화 스킬로 교체\n공격 범위 확대\n푸른 열정 +1
SKT_BURST_3.effect_zh: 替换为强化技能\n攻击范围扩大\n「蓝色热情」+1

SKT_SECOND.name: Master, Spike!
SKT_SECOND.true_desc:
(Passive Effect) Decreases damage taken by all allies by <color=#28d9ed>10%</color>, and if the caster is the only Defender among allies, damage received from a single attack does not exceed <color=#28d9ed>65%</color> of the caster's Max Health (includes Dual Attacks and Additional Attacks).

(Active Effect) Increases all allies' <color=#28d9ed>Penetration</color> and <color=#28d9ed>Defense</color> for <color=#28d9ed>1</color> turns, then attacks all enemies and increases the caster's <color=#28d9ed>Combat Readiness</color> by <color=#28d9ed>20%</color>.
Damage dealt increases proportional to Max Heath instead of Attack.
SKT_SECOND.true_desc_jp:
(パッシブ効果)味方全体が受けるダメージを<color=#28d9ed>10%</color>減少させ、味方中で自身が唯一の防御型である場合、1回で受けるダメージは自身の最大HPの<color=#28d9ed>65%</color>を超えない(協攻・追加攻撃を含む)。

(アクティブ効果)<color=#28d9ed>1</color>ターンの間、味方全体の<color=#28d9ed>貫通力</color>と<color=#28d9ed>防御力</color>を上昇させ、その後、敵全体を攻撃し、自身の<color=#28d9ed>行動ゲージ</color>を<color=#28d9ed>20%</color>増加させる。
このスキルは攻撃力の代わりに最大HPが高いほどダメージがUPする。
SKT_SECOND.true_desc_kr:
(패시브 효과) 아군 전체가 받는 피해를 <color=#28d9ed>10%</color> 감소시키고 자신이 아군 중 유일한 방어형이라면 한번에 받는 피해는 자신 최대 체력의 <color=#28d9ed>65%</color>를 초과하지 않습니다. (협공 및 추가타 포함)

(액티브 효과) <color=#28d9ed>1턴</color> 동안 아군 전체의 <color=#28d9ed>관통력</color>과 <color=#28d9ed>방어력</color>을 증가시킨 뒤 적 전체를 공격하고 자신의 <color=#28d9ed>행동 게이지</color>를 <color=#28d9ed>20%</color> 증가시킵니다.
이 스킬은 공격력 대신 최대 체력에 비례하여 피해가 증가합니다.
SKT_SECOND.true_desc_zh:
(被动效果)使我方全体受到的伤害减少<color=#28d9ed>10%</color>,若自身是队伍中唯一的防御型,单次受到的伤害不会超过自身最大生命值的<color=#28d9ed>65%</color>。(含协攻与追加攻击)

(主动效果)使我方全体<color=#28d9ed>穿透力</color>与<color=#28d9ed>防御力</color>提升,持续<color=#28d9ed>1</color>回合,随后攻击全体敌人,并使自身的<color=#28d9ed>行动条</color>增加<color=#28d9ed>20%</color>。
此技能的伤害随施术者的最大生命值提高。

SKT_ULTIMATE.name: Sudden Strike!
SKT_ULTIMATE.true_desc:
Deals Fixed Damage equal to <color=#28d9ed>5%</color> of the caster's Max Health, then attacks all enemies. After attacking, increases the <color=#28d9ed>Priority</color> of all allies by <color=#28d9ed>10%</color>, and additionally deals Fixed Damage to bosses equal to <color=#28d9ed>8%</color> of the boss's Max HP.

When holding <color=#28d9ed>5</color> <color=#28d9ed>Unique Resource: Azure Will</color>, consumes all to double both the Fixed Damage and the Priority increase. (Bosses cannot be defeated by Fixed Damage applied after the attack.)
Damage dealt increases proportional to Max Heath instead of Attack.
SKT_ULTIMATE.true_desc_jp:
敵全体に自身の最大HPの<color=#28d9ed>5%</color>分の固定ダメージを与え、その後攻撃する。攻撃後、味方全体の<color=#28d9ed>行動ゲージ</color>を<color=#28d9ed>10%</color>増加させ、ボスにはボスの最大HPの<color=#28d9ed>8%</color>分の固定ダメージを追加で与える。

<color=#28d9ed>「青き情熱」</color>を<color=#28d9ed>5</color>個保有している場合、すべて消費し、固定ダメージと行動ゲージ増加量が2倍になる。(攻撃後に付与される固定ダメージではボスを撃破できない)
このスキルは攻撃力の代わりに最大HPが高いほどダメージがUPする。
SKT_ULTIMATE.true_desc_kr:
적 전체에게 자신의 최대 체력의 <color=#28d9ed>5%</color> 만큼 고정 피해를 입힌 후 공격합니다. 공격 후 아군 전체의 <color=#28d9ed>행동 게이지</color>가 <color=#28d9ed>10%</color> 증가하고, 보스에게는 보스의 최대 체력의 <color=#28d9ed>8%</color> 만큼 고정 피해를 추가로 부여합니다.

<color=#28d9ed>고유 자원 : 푸른 열정</color>을 5개 보유 시, 모두 소모하여 고정 피해, 행동 게이지 증가 비율이 2배로 적용 됩니다. (공격 후 부여되는 고정 피해로는 보스가 사망하지 않습니다.)
이 스킬은 공격력 대신 최대 체력에 비례하여 피해가 증가합니다.
SKT_ULTIMATE.true_desc_zh:
对全体敌人造成等于自身最大生命值<color=#28d9ed>5%</color>的固定伤害后进行攻击。攻击后,使我方全体<color=#28d9ed>行动条</color>增加<color=#28d9ed>10%</color>,并对Boss额外造成其最大生命值<color=#28d9ed>8%</color>的固定伤害。

当持有<color=#28d9ed>5</color>个<color=#28d9ed>「蓝色热情」</color>时,全部消耗,使固定伤害与行动条增加效果翻倍。(攻击后的固定伤害无法击杀Boss)
该技能的伤害随施术者的最大生命值提高。

3: Fixed Damage +5% of self Max HP
3_jp: 自身最大HPの固定ダメージ+5%
3_zh: 自身最大生命值的固定伤害+5%
4: Fixed Damage +5% of self Max HP
4_jp: 自身最大HPの固定ダメージ+5%
4_zh: 自身最大生命值的固定伤害+5%

SKT_CHAIN_PASSIVE.name: Chain Passive
SKT_CHAIN_PASSIVE.true_desc: <color=#ffd732>Chain Companion Effect</color>: After attacking, additionally decreases the target's <color=#28d9ed>Weakness Gauge</color> by <color=#28d9ed>3</color>.\n\n<color=#ffd732>Dual Attack Effect</color>: After attacking, has a 50% chance to dispel 1 <color=#28d9ed>Buff(s)</color> from the target.
SKT_CHAIN_PASSIVE.true_desc_jp: <color=#ffd732>チェーン効果(汎用)</color>:攻撃後、対象の<color=#28d9ed>WG</color>を<color=#28d9ed>3</color>追加で減少させる。\n\n<color=#ffd732>連携効果</color>:攻撃後、<color=#28d9ed>50%</color>の確率で対象の<color=#28d9ed>強化効果</color>を<color=#28d9ed>1</color>個解除する。
SKT_CHAIN_PASSIVE.true_desc_kr: <color=#ffd732>체인 컴패니언 효과</color> : 공격 후 <color=#28d9ed>3</color>의 WG를 추가로 감소시킵니다.\n\n<color=#ffd732>협공 효과</color> : 공격 후 50% 확률로 대상의 <color=#28d9ed>강화 효과</color>를 1개 해제합니다.
SKT_CHAIN_PASSIVE.true_desc_zh: <color=#ffd732>连锁同伴效果</color>:攻击后,额外减少目标<color=#28d9ed>弱点槽</color><color=#28d9ed>3</color>点。\n\n<color=#ffd732>协同攻击效果</color>:攻击后,有50%概率解除目标<color=#28d9ed>1</color>个<color=#28d9ed>强化效果</color>。

2: +5% Dual Attack and Skill Chain damage
2_jp: チェーンスキルと連携ダメージ+5%
3: +5% Dual Attack and Skill Chain damage
3_jp: チェーンスキルと連携ダメージ+5%
4: +5% Dual Attack and Skill Chain damage
4_jp: チェーンスキルと連携ダメージ+5%
5: +5% Dual Attack and Skill Chain damage
5_jp: チェーンスキルと連携ダメージ+5%
